casebody.data:
GREYSTONE NEVADA, LLC, a Delaware corporation, Appellant,
v.
Oliver M. MCCOY, Jr., individually; Sean and Felicia Delapa, individually; John B. Davis, individually; Nehama Krams, individually; Gabriela Dietz, individually; Erik Elder, individually; Tomer Hazut, individually; Kim Nickell, individually; Edo Pellach, individually; and Yuvadee Phumpachart, individually, Respondents. No. 68769 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 12, 2018

Reverse. Remand.
